means: 堂吉诃德（西班牙作家塞万提斯所著<堂吉诃德>中的主人公）

sentence.Network_en: Don Quixote, eponymous hero of the great novel by Cervantes
sentence.Network_cn: 堂吉诃德—塞万提斯巨著中与书同名的主人公

sentence.Network_en: Don Quixote mistook the windmills for giants.
sentence.Network_cn: 唐吉诃德错把风车当巨人.

sentence.Network_en: For eight more days Don Quixote worried and fretted over this problem.
sentence.Network_cn: 堂吉诃德为这个问题焦躁不安,就这样又延迟了八天多的时间.
